title: Archinect入驻微信，小红书平台 / Archinect launches on WeChat and RED in China
author: Archinect
excerpt: Archinect is thrilled to announce our official debut on two of China’s leading social media platforms—WeChat and RED (Xiaohongshu). This milestone marks an important step in Archinect’s 27-year mission of connecting the global architecture community. With an official presence on these...
text: anchor Archinect is thrilled to announce our official debut on two of China’s leading social media platforms—WeChat and RED (Xiaohongshu). This milestone marks an important step in Archinect’s 27-year mission of connecting the global architecture community. With an official presence on these platforms, we aim to establish closer connections with Chinese-speaking architects and design enthusiasts. Since its founding in 1997, Archinect has been dedicated to fostering meaningful connections among architects worldwide. By launching on WeChat and RED, we’re excited to bring Archinect’s distinctive voice to China’s thriving architecture and design scene while introducing exclusive content tailored for our growing audience. Follow Archinect on WeChat WeChat is China’s premier all-in-one platform for messaging, digital publishing, and social media, with over 1 billion active users. Through our official WeChat account, we’ll deliver the latest architectural news, interviews, and updates, tailored to engage the Chinese architecture community. Scan the QR code above or search for “Archinect Official” on WeChat to follow us.Discover Archinect on RED (Xiaohongshu) Often referred to as “China’s Instagram,” RED (Xiaohongshu) is a rapidly growing social platform where users share experiences through curated photos and videos. With over 450 million registered users, RED offers a vibrant stage for Archinect to highlight global architecture and design projects to an even broader audience. Scan the QR code above or search for “Archinect China” on RED (Xiaohongshu) to join us.We’re excited to bring Archinect’s global community closer to China’s design scene and invite you to connect with us on these platforms. Stay tuned for exclusive content, local insights, and much more. --- 我们很高兴地宣布：Archinect已正式登陆中国两大领先的社交媒体平台——微信（WeChat）和小红书（RED）。这一里程碑标志着Archinect自成立27年来，在连接全球建筑师社区的使命上又迈出了重要一步。通过入驻这些平台，我们期待与中文用户建立更紧密的联系，为建筑师和设计爱好者提供更多的优质内容。 自1997年成立以来，Archinect始终致力于促进全球建筑师之间的互动与交流。通过登陆微信和小红书，我们不仅将Archinect的独特声音带入中国充满活力的建筑与设计领域，也为不断壮大的受众群体提供独家内容和本地化的资讯。 关注Archinect官方微信 微信是中国领先的综合性平台，涵盖社交、数字出版和支付功能，活跃用户超过10亿。通过Archinect官方微信账号，我们将为中国建筑社区提供最新的建筑新闻、深度访谈及动态资讯。 扫描下方二维码或搜索“Archinect Official”关注我们。 发现Archinect小红书账号 小红书（RED）被誉为“中国版Instagram”，是一个快速增长的社交平台，用户通过精选的照片和视频分享个人体验。该平台注册用户已超过4.5亿，为Archinect提供了一个展示全球建筑与设计项目的绝佳舞台。 扫描下方二维码或搜索“Archinect Official”加入我们。 我们非常期待通过这些平台，让Archinect的全球社区与中国的设计与建筑场景更加紧密地联系在一起。敬请期待更多独家内容、本地视角和精彩更新！
html:
• anchor

    Archinect is thrilled to announce our official debut on two of China’s leading social media platforms—WeChat and RED (Xiaohongshu). This milestone marks an important step in Archinect’s 27-year mission of connecting the global architecture community. With an official presence on these platforms, we aim to establish closer connections with Chinese-speaking architects and design enthusiasts.

    Since its founding in 1997, Archinect has been dedicated to fostering meaningful connections among architects worldwide. By launching on WeChat and RED, we’re excited to bring Archinect’s distinctive voice to China’s thriving architecture and design scene while introducing exclusive content tailored for our growing audience.

    Follow Archinect on WeChat

    WeChat is China’s premier all-in-one platform for messaging, digital publishing, and social media, with over 1 billion active users. Through our official WeChat account, we’ll deliver the latest architectural news, interviews, and updates, tailored to engage the Chinese architecture community.

    Discover Archinect on RED (Xiaohongshu)

    Often referred to as “China’s Instagram,” RED (Xiaohongshu) is a rapidly growing social platform where users share experiences through curated photos and videos. With over 450 million registered users, RED offers a vibrant stage for Archinect to highlight global architecture and design projects to an even broader audience.

    We’re excited to bring Archinect’s global community closer to China’s design scene and invite you to connect with us on these platforms. Stay tuned for exclusive content, local insights, and much more.

    ---

    我们很高兴地宣布：Archinect已正式登陆中国两大领先的社交媒体平台——微信（WeChat）和小红书（RED）。这一里程碑标志着Archinect自成立27年来，在连接全球建筑师社区的使命上又迈出了重要一步。通过入驻这些平台，我们期待与中文用户建立更紧密的联系，为建筑师和设计爱好者提供更多的优质内容。

    自1997年成立以来，Archinect始终致力于促进全球建筑师之间的互动与交流。通过登陆微信和小红书，我们不仅将Archinect的独特声音带入中国充满活力的建筑与设计领域，也为不断壮大的受众群体提供独家内容和本地化的资讯。

    关注Archinect官方微信

    微信是中国领先的综合性平台，涵盖社交、数字出版和支付功能，活跃用户超过10亿。通过Archinect官方微信账号，我们将为中国建筑社区提供最新的建筑新闻、深度访谈及动态资讯。

    扫描下方二维码或搜索“Archinect Official”关注我们。

    发现Archinect小红书账号

    小红书（RED）被誉为“中国版Instagram”，是一个快速增长的社交平台，用户通过精选的照片和视频分享个人体验。该平台注册用户已超过4.5亿，为Archinect提供了一个展示全球建筑与设计项目的绝佳舞台。

    扫描下方二维码或搜索“Archinect Official”加入我们。

    我们非常期待通过这些平台，让Archinect的全球社区与中国的设计与建筑场景更加紧密地联系在一起。敬请期待更多独家内容、本地视角和精彩更新！
